list-item.p: Nurses’ sense of duty, dedication to patient care, personal sacrifice and professional collegiality is heightened during a pandemic or an epidemic.
Concerns for personal and family safety, and fear and vulnerability issues remain paramount.
Nurses are willing to accept the risks of their occupation in the pandemic situation.
The significant impact of nurses’ experiences highlights a need for strategies around self-care and ongoing support to ensure the health of nurses is maintained.
